# init(mapItem:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new structured location with the specified map item.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(mapItem: MKMapItem)
```

## Parameters

- **mapItem**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItem] object that represents the location.

## Creating Structured Locations

- **init(title:)**: Creates a new structured location with the specified title.

items.description: Creates a new structured location with the specified title.
items.name: init(title:)

title: init(mapItem:)
